segments.text: Hi , Mary ! You're here already . Where's Harry ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He isn't a punctual person . We may have to wait for a little while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That should give us time for a cup of coffee . I'll go and get some .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make it three cups . Here comes Harry .
segments.speaker: S2
